body.name: Nimbus Extra Soft Toothbrushes (Compact Size Head) Periodontist Design Tapered Bristles for Sensitive Teeth and Receding Gums, Individually Wrapped Plaque Remover Toothbrush (5 Pack, Colors May Vary)

features: EXTRA SOFT BRISTLES – The Nimbus Toothbrush uses Microfine Technology which utilizes two-levels of bristles to create unique softness and stability. The long single-end tapered fine bristles reach into areas not accessible to conventional bristles while the short end-rounded bristles are used to support and optimize plaque removal.

DURABLE – Nimbus bristles absorb less water which allows the brush to maintain its shape longer than standard Nylon bristles. Additionally, the bristles resist breakdown brought on from chemicals and natural mouth fluids which allows you to use Nimbus longer than average toothbrushes.

INVENTED BY PERIODONTIST – These toothbrushes were designed to create the safest brushing experience for teeth and gums while simultaneously providing highly efficient plaque removal on tooth surfaces. It has proven to be the best toothbrush for those with ultra-sensitive gums and teeth.

TESTED BY DENTIST – The Nimbus Microfine Technology has been evaluated by dental professionals. The consensus from testing the Nimbus brushes is this is the best brush you will ever use. The results speak for themselves.

5-PACK COMPACT SIZE – The Compact Size Nimbus is great for those who prefer a smaller brush head. The head of the compact size measures 2mm shorter in both length and width. This smaller head is perfect for individuals with small mouths. It is also ideal for frequent travelers to fit comfortably in a travel bag. This value pack comes with 5 brushes, enough for the whole family. Or you can save a couple as designated travel brushes. The colors included in the pack may vary.
body.description: LOVE YOUR SMILE It's like a massage for your gums Hard bristles along with not properly cleaning your teeth can cause more harm than good, making your gums even more sensitive and damaged. Our pliable and ultra soft bristles are great for gums that are sensitive or inflamed. The long soft bristles are able to gently get into hard-to-reach crevices and gaps to remove the plaque build up. This is ideal for people with crowns, caps, implants, or gum recession that need an extra soft bristle to clean those sensitive areas. The Nimbus extra soft toothbrush is tender thanks to it's extra thin PBT fibers It effectively cleans the teeth and gums with it's 2 tiered design of densely arranged fibers You'll have access to all areas of the mouth due to our offers of different head sizes The square handle allows for the ideal 45 degree angle of cleaning

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: The Nimbus Microfine Toothbrush is designed to be an efficient plaque remover without damaging your gums. The long extra soft tapered bristles are great for reaching hard-to-reach places, while the stiffer but soft shorter bristles help support effective plaque removal. Periodontists, dentists that specialize in gum health, recommend using toothbrushes with super soft bristles to protect your gums and prevent further harm and damage from occurring. Furthermore, if you're using a soft bristled brush, you will not avoid brushing along the gums. The gum line is where the most plaque accumulates, so it's important to find a brush that is gentle in cleaning this sensitive area. The gentle massaging also means you are stimulating your gums leading to better circulation which is beneficial for the entire tooth support system.

The Nimbus Microfine Toothbrush is designed to be an efficient plaque remover without damaging your gums. Furthermore, if you're using a soft bristled brush, you will not avoid brushing along the gums. The gum line is where the most plaque accumulates, so it's important to find a brush that is gentle in cleaning this sensitive area. The gentle massaging also means you are stimulating your gums leading to better circulation which is beneficial for the entire tooth support system.

Why Nimbus Toothbrushes? Nimbus was developed by Periodontist Dr. Stanley Klein. He specially designed and manufactures the bristles specifically for the Nimbus toothbrush so that you can take brushing your teeth to the next level. Periodontist Designed Family Friendly Microfine Technology Refreshing Feel LOVE YOUR SMILE It's like a massage for your gums Hard bristles along with not properly cleaning your teeth can cause more harm than good, making your gums even more sensitive and damaged. Our pliable and ultra soft bristles are great for gums that are sensitive or inflamed. The long soft bristles are able to gently get into hard-to-reach crevices and gaps to remove the plaque build up. This is ideal for people with crowns, caps, implants, or gum recession that need an extra soft bristle to clean those sensitive areas. reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great manual toothbrush
reviews.reviewText: Soft bristles as easy on the gums. This brush has very fine bristles which are able to clean below the gumline if angled correctly. You can feel it has cleaned well. Manual brushes are only as good as your technique, but this is a capable tool. The multipack is convenient for making sure you have a new brush every 3 months.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very gentle and effective
reviews.reviewText: I've been using these for years. The bristles are so much better than standard type for getting in between teeth, and they are gentle on the gums as well

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The Nimbus Extra Soft Toothbrushes are easy to hold, well made and very soft. Quality product!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Well Made and Effective
reviews.reviewText: My dentist gave me one of these toothbrushes after my last visit. Although they are more expensive than the brand I had been using I found that they didn’t hurt my gums and appear to be doing an equally good job.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great new find.
reviews.reviewText: I was looking for extra soft tooth brushes. I got others and decided to also give this brand a try. I just lovethem. They are really soft and fit my hand so they don't slip around. Try them. Enjoy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars soft bristles that are not harsh on your teeth and gums
reviews.reviewText: My sister's told me about these so I thought I'd give them a try. Glad I did, I love the bristles..they are soft yet sturdy and aren't falling apart right away. My teeth and gums feel great after using this tooth brush!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My teeth are CLEAN and my gums Don't bleed!
reviews.reviewText: Backstory: Using hard or medium toothbrushes had my gums bleeding, which lead to a slight case of periodontal disease. Switched on the advice of an online article regarding toothbrushes or how to clean your teeth. Truth be told, I found No Difference in cleanliness. My teeth were cleanly smooth But my gums Weren't irritated. I even started to gently clean Around my gumline, which I didn't dare do with a harder brush, and my gums bounced back.So. Regarding The Nimbus Extra Soft Toothbrushes are heaven for my teeth and gumline. Due to my weight, I've become a mouth breather and that dries my mouth out something fierce, so the periodontal disease returned. However, my dentist was surprised that my gums hadn't receded as terribly as expected. Due, I believe, to my using my Nimbus extra soft toothbrushes to keep the plaque at bay and my gums stronger than they would have been otherwise. Fact.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars soft, but brush well, easy on sensitive teeth
reviews.reviewText: like these brushes so much- easy on my sensitive teeth
